CustomField.description:
Used for genuine secondary address fields OR generic email addresses, like info@company.com, since the email address field is a unique field (Tourism only) but two separate contacts may share an email address.
This field will NOT be used by Responsys (only [Primary] email)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If a Contact is using a group email address (e.g. info@company.com) then please enter it here instead of the Primary email address field.
CustomField.label: Secondary Email Address
